unboxing.title: Unboxing Experience
unboxing.template: Create a detailed unboxing script for {product} in {tone}. "Today we're unboxing the brand new [Product] that everyone's been talking about..."

hidden_features.title: Hidden Features

For each feature, provide a clear title, explain what it does, how to access or activate it, practical applications, and why it's valuable. Focus on genuinely useful features rather than obvious ones, and include any relevant keyboard shortcuts, gestures, or menu paths. {trendContext}
